attributes.action: keep the same level of funding for the Armed Forces or increase it and do not cut jobs from the forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British Army is one of the best, if not the best, in the world. To keep it this way, funding must stay the same or increase.

If one looks at the Navy, Top Naval officers will have their promotion frozen for the while and up to half of the Navl fleet will be moothballed, to name a couple. All in the name of cost cutting.

The once world dominating British Navy is turning out to be no more than a Coast Guard.

Please, please, please, increase Armed Forces funding and do not cut jobs. The Armed forces are very important to the country, lets keep it that way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
